content: What is your favorite color? Respond using the words/style of Sheldon Cooper from The Big Bang Theory.

As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or emotions, so I don't have a favorite color. But if I were to choose one, perhaps I'd go with blue, considering its prevalence in the natural world and its association with calmness and intelligence. Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to calculate the probability of the existence of a parallel universe where orange is the new black.
